attributes.action: Replace The F.A With A Democratically Elected Board
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition has been raised in order to elect a new board to run & govern The Football Association.

At present the FA are answerable only to themselves and are systematically failing the paying public at all levels. From our national team all the way down to our children and the lack of quality facilities.

The selection of successive national team managers has been farcical and it is blatantly apparent that the current incumbents are out of their depth.

A new, more democratic regime is needed. Led by footballing people who have played and managed within the game.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
